00011 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_FUNCTION_HPP_INCLUDED
00012 #define BOOST_TT_IS_FUNCTION_HPP_INCLUDED
00013 
00014 #include "boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp"
00015 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/false_result.hpp"
00016 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00017 
00018 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00019 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/is_function_ptr_helper.hpp"
00020 #else
00021 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/is_function_ptr_tester.hpp"
00022 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/yes_no_type.hpp"
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 // should be the last #include
00026 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00027 
00028 // is a type a function?
00029 // Please note that this implementation is unnecessarily complex:
00030 // we could just use !is_convertible<T*, const volatile void*>::value,
00031 // except that some compilers erroneously allow conversions from
00032 // function pointers to void*.
00033 
00034 namespace boost {
00035 namespace detail {
00036 
00037 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00038 template<bool is_ref = true>
00039 struct is_function_chooser
00040     : ::boost::type_traits::false_result
00041 {
00042 };
00043 
00044 template <>
00045 struct is_function_chooser<false>
00046 {
00047     template< typename T > struct result_
00048         : ::boost::type_traits::is_function_ptr_helper<T*>
00049     {
00050     };
00051 };
00052 
00053 template <typename T>
00054 struct is_function_impl
00055     : is_function_chooser< ::boost::is_reference<T>::value >
00056         ::BOOST_NESTED_TEMPLATE result_<T>
00057 {
00058 };
00059 
00060 #else
00061 
00062 template <typename T>
00063 struct is_function_impl
00064 {
00065     static T* t;
00066     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00067         bool, value = sizeof(::boost::type_traits::is_function_ptr_tester(t))
00068         == sizeof(::boost::type_traits::yes_type)
00069         );
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 } // namespace detail
00075 
00076 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_function,T,::boost::detail::is_function_impl<T>::value)
00077 
00078 } // namespace boost
00079 
00080 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"
00081 
00082 #endif // BOOST_TT_IS_FUNCTION_HPP_INCLUDED
